plans.description:
Benefits : Voice - 500 mins (For Wi-Fi Calls to India Only +  Incoming Wi-Fi call from anywhere). Beyond FUP, Incoming call from any country at ¿ 1/Min, Outgoing call to India at ¿ 1 /Min. This pack will only work if your handset supports Wi-Fi Calling. To check handset compatibility, visit: bit.ly/3r6jx8a
This pack can be used for making Wi-Fi outgoing calls to India ONLY and incoming Wi-Fi calls can be received from anywhere.
Outgoing calls/SMS to Local/ROW are NOT allowed in this pack.
Validity: 10 days
To know more about How To Enable Wi-Fi Calling, please visit: bit.ly/3JB5qxX
plans.planName: IR Wi-Fi India Calling Pack- Rs. 521

plans.description:
Benefits : Voice - 100 mins (For Outgoing Wi-Fi Calls to India Only + Incoming Wi-Fi call from anywhere). Beyond FUP, Incoming calls from any country at ¿ 1/Min, Outgoing calls to India at ¿ 1 /Min.  This pack will only work if your handset supports Wi-Fi Calling. To check handset compatibility, visit: bit.ly/3r6jx8a
This pack can be used for making Wi-Fi outgoing calls to India ONLY and incoming Wi-Fi calls can be received from anywhere.
Outgoing calls/SMS to Local/ROW are NOT allowed in this pack.
Validity: 10 days
To know more about How To Enable Wi-Fi Calling, please visit: bit.ly/3JB5qxX
